Summary: light with direction change and then disappears suddenly
trends: There has been one other sighting in Middleburgh
There were no other sightings in Middleburgh on or around June 19th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking across the lawn when I seen a bright light moving fast...it was brightly lit with the moon out...I noticed it moved fast enough for me to originally think it was a plane it moved the distance of sereral fists and was moving on a zig zag type of motion then i moved into the field it kept tracking across the sky....as I watched it move it "blinked" out and was gone it didn't move fast out of my view...it just disappeared like a light switch went out....I originally thought it may be a satellite or the space station it was the brightest light in the sky with the bright moon up in the sky...it just flashed and disappeared...strange....indeed
